select u.id, u.nombre, u.apellido, u.email, u.telefono, u.tipoUsuario, u.contrasena,
v.id as v_id,
u2.id as v_i_u_id, u2.nombre as v_i_u_nombre, u2.apellido as v_i_u_apellido, u2.email as v_i_u_email, u2.telefono as v_i_u_telefono, u2.tipoUsuario as v_i_u_tipoUsuario, u2.contrasena as v_i_u_contrasena,
i.num as v_i_num, i.descripcion as v_i_descripcion, i.fechaRegistro as v_i_fechaRegistro, i.estado as v_i_estado, i.areaProponente as v_i_areaProponente,
c.id as v_i_c_id , c.idIniciativa as v_i_c_idIniciativa, c.idPalabraClave as v_i_c_idPalabraClave,
d.id as v_i_c_d_id, d.descripcion as v_i_c_d_descripcion from USUARIO u left join VOTO as v on v.idUsuario=u.id left join INICIATIVA as i on v.numIniciativa=i.num left join USUARIO as u2 on i.usuarioProponente=u2.id left join INICIATIVAPALABRA as c on c.idIniciativa=i.num left join PALABRASCLAVE as d on d.id=c.idPalabraClave WHERE u.email=#{email};
